Why you should upgrade to an SSD

I just upgraded the hard drive of my MacBook Pro from an HDD to an SSD. As you can see in the video below the boot time of my laptop increased incredible. With the HDD it took over 10 Minutes to boot up my laptop and start Spotify. With my new SSD this is done in less than 30 seconds.

»
Markus Vieghofer 18 Nov 2015
#hard-drive #speed #ssd

Why Google Code is dead and why GitHub is the better choice

The project hosting platform Google Code was started in 2006. After 9 years the platform lost its shine. A lot of projects migrated to GitHub and Google Code got more and more a cemetery of dead projects. Due to these trend Google decided to close Google Code.
